item.title: As Mark Zuckerberg Focuses on “Personal Superintelligence,” Meta Smashes Quarterly Expectations
item.description: The owner of Instagram, Facebook and WhatsApp revealed a blockbuster earnings report Wednesday afternoon.

item.title: Instagram changes its algorithm after being accused of steering predators to children
item.description: Instagram accounts that primarily feature images of children, but are run by adult users, will no longer be recommended to “potentially suspicious adults.” The update was announced in a blog post deta

item.title: Toy company may regret coming for “Sylvanian Drama” TikToker, experts say
item.description: Possible legal paths to revive a shuttered video series on TikTok and Instagram.

item.title: A Head-to-Toe Breakdown of Social Media’s Billion-Dollar Remedies
item.description: Bad mood? Puffy face? Immune issues? Across TikTok and Instagram there are scores of influencers ready to sell you some products—without ever sending you to a doctor.

item.title: How to Delete All of Your Social Media Accounts: Instagram, X, Facebook, TikTok, and More
item.description: Breaking up is hard to do—harder yet when there’s a deactivation period. Here’s how to log off every big social site, including Facebook, Instagram, TikTok, X, Threads, Bluesky, and Truth Social.
